entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
